overview.headline: Next period highlights day master strength with supporting emphasis.
bullets: Top window 2026-01-01 to 2026-01-31 (supporting, intensity 0.55, confidence 0.80) themes: day_master_strength, element_earth, pillar_cycle.

windows.title: Supportive window for day master strength
paragraphs: From 2026-01-01 to 2026-01-31, this is a supporting period with intensity 0.55 and confidence 0.80.
Primary focus: day master strength and element earth.
Signals align across 2 systems (chinese and vedic).
takeaways: Lean into day master strength actions; aim for steady execution.
Prioritize decisions that compound over weeks, not days.
